meaning_mnemonic:
<reading>Who are who are</reading> (ふわふわ) <vocabulary>fluffy</vocabulary>? I’m thinking puppies, but ask yourself, "who are the fluffiest creatures I know?"

This is an オノマトペ meaning fluffy, like a puppy, a cloud, or a cotton ball. It can also describe the movement of a dandelion puffball or a jellyfish, <vocabulary>floating lightly</vocabulary> in the air or the water. And if you’re <vocabulary>feeling lightheaded</vocabulary>, that’s called ふわふわ too. Basically, anything with light or fluffy vibe!
